summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeJoico JoiMist Firm Protective Finishing Spray locks in style without a bulletproof, tacky layer; giving you movement, flexibility, and serious, Level-9, all-day hold while protecting hair from frizz, humidity, and damage.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll-day holding powerHelps control flyaways & frizzThermal protectionProtects against humidityProtects against pollution*Paraben-freeFree of SLS/SLES Sulfates***Laboratory tested using pollution particles** SLS/SLES Sulfates = sodium lauryl sulfate/sodium laureth sulfateItem 2579862How To UseShake well. Spritz lightly, holding product 8-10 inches from your hair and lock in your look in seconds - no drying time needed. To double your efforts, take one more pass and be prepared for astonishing all-day hold.IngredientsAlcohol Denat., Dimethyl Ether, Butane, Propane, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Pentapeptide-29 Cysteinamide, Pentapeptide-30 Cysteinamide, Tetrapeptide-28 Argininamide, Tetrapeptide-29 Argininamide, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Cocodimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Amp-Isostearoyl Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Aleurites Moluccana Seed Oil, Panthenol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Triethyl Citrate, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Pentaerythrityl Tetracaprylate/Tetracaprate, Benzophenone-4, Fragrance/Parfum.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake well. Spritz lightly, holding product 8-10 inches from your hair and lock in your look in seconds - no drying time needed. To double your efforts, take one more pass and be prepared for astonishing all-day hold.

reviews.headline: Wonderful product
reviews.comments: Holds hair without being stiff or gummy.  Washes out easily.

reviews.headline: So far so good
reviews.comments: I have used this for one week after using redken for 20+ years. This has been easy, not too strong of fragrance, holds well, and applies easily.

reviews.headline: It works!!
reviews.comments: I've used this product for years. Tried other brands and they didn't compare.

reviews.headline: Love...love....
reviews.comments: Best of the best  !

reviews.headline: If you know, you know..
reviews.comments: This is to anyone who has been a longtime Joico Hairspray fan.  This hairspray used to be a completely silver can and smelled so nice.  Then the "powers that be" decided they needed to change up the scent -- now, it is absolutely terrible!!!

reviews.headline: Replaced Kenra25
reviews.comments: I dtarted using this hairspray after Kenra ruined the infamous Kenra25 Volume spray.  This isnt a dupe but its a good hairspray. I like it.

reviews.headline: Leaves hair tangled
reviews.comments: I was told to buy from a stylist for volume and lift unfortunately it just tangled my hair into a mess

reviews.headline: Love this hairspray
reviews.comments: Love this hairspray

reviews.headline: I love this hairspray
reviews.comments: The reviews, here, that compare this spray to a discontinued spray are based on a different expectation.  I had no prior expectation upon trying it.  I love it.  I have long hair that is dyed and trends towards dry. And I love that this hairspray doesn't make a helmet out of my hair, leaving it touchable. I love that I can brush through it at the end of the day without my hair snapping.  Thank you Joico.

reviews.headline: Best for High humidity states.
reviews.comments:
Holds great, smell great, however like everything else price keeps rising! 
Thank goodness a little goes a long way!

reviews.headline: This Hairspray Works Very Well
reviews.comments: I bought this because the Redkin spray that I usually use was out and being reformulated.  Not only do I like the way this this feels and holds my hairstyle better, it is less money!  Win! Win!

reviews.headline: I really like this hairspray!
reviews.comments: This is one of the few hairsprays that actually work in my thin, fine hair without looking bad or stiff. I really like it! I use it to help build volume and it holds!

reviews.headline: replacement for JoiMist Firm spray?
reviews.comments: is this the replacement for the old JoiMist Firm Finishing Spray that used to have the pump spray? really Joico? Aerosol for a firm hold finishing spray? please bring back the old pump spray bottle and formula. I've been loyal to your products for over 40 years.

reviews.headline: I buy this product again and again.
reviews.comments: Simply the best!

reviews.headline: I buy this spray frequently.
reviews.comments:
I use this spray daily before and after I style my hair.  Along with the humidity blocker;  I like the way it holds the look of my hair. 
Frequently, the sprayer gets gummed up and the spray goes in another direction.  I have to use a brush and soap to unclog the sprayer.

reviews.headline: The only spray that will hold my baby fine hair!
reviews.comments: This spray holds my hair in humidity , etc..

reviews.headline: Shocked at the bad reviews
reviews.comments: This is my daily go to hairspray.  I used to use Big Sexy hair but too hard and sticky.  This has the same hold without the "lacquer" look. Love it!!!!

reviews.headline: smells like bug spray
reviews.comments:
I used Joico for many years. Likes everything about it.  Purchased one as usual, and was shocked that it smelled like bug spray. Seriously.  Thought something might have been wrong. Ordered again. Nope. Joico went from smelling very lovely to absolutely horrible.

I am very disappointed.

Would give 0 stars if able.

reviews.headline: Terrible!!!
reviews.comments: I used to buy Joico #9 hairspray in bulk.  I have used it for years.  It had great hold, was not sticky and held up in the humidity and rain.  The reformulation is terrible!  Absolutely zero hold and smells terrible.  So disappointed.  Why change something that worked so well?!

reviews.headline: The Windows 8 of Hairspray Redesign
reviews.comments: Why take a product that worked amazingly well and had a huge following and change ANYTHING about it? If it ain't broke, don't fix it. I've been using the original version for YEARS. I justified it being pricey by telling myself it lasted twice as long and performed better than drugstore brands. Might as well buy any old $4.99 can of hairspray now, because this new version works about as well as that. Wears off after a couple of hours and smells like old lady hairspray. The original version smelled great and worked SO much better. Please bring it back!

properties.name: Cons

values.label: Terrible new formula, bad smell, ZERO hold

display_values: Terrible new formula, bad smell, ZERO hold

faceoff_positive.comments:
I love when products provide multiple benifits, so I absolutely LOVE Joico's JoiMist- Firm. This formula is like liquid gold and my new Holy Grail styling product. 

I want to be careful not to call this a hairspray because it's so much more than that. Yes, it provides EXCELLENT  (I'm talking wind proof, dancing proof, even workout proof!) hold, but it doesn't make my hair feel crispy, crunchy or dry at all. When I spray this on curls, they stay ALL DAY which is amazing in and of itself because my super heavy, thick, long but super fine hair doesn't like to hold a curl at all. This is perfect for achieving that toussled look, as it gives my hair some much needed texture and volume. And of course, it provides the superior hold for the clean, sleek, dramatic looks too. Instead of making my hair look dry and dull though, this seems to provide a healthy shine, with not a hint of residue by the day/nights end. 

Another major pro to this formula is that it doesn't build up in my hair. It doesn't get sticky or goopy when wet and it washes out well. I can style my hair with this and easily brush my hair when I'm ready to change the style up. It isn't damaging either- not even a little bit. For me that's HUGE because my hair breaks when the wind blows. 

On top of that this is, without a doupt, the frizz fighting, anti-humidity champion! I brought it with me on my recent PR vacation where temps were in the high 90s and humidity was as high as 89%! While my body was profusely dripping with sweat every night at dinner, I had not a single hair out of place! No frizz, no craziness, no fly aways.  And trust me- I've tried everything to combat these issues in the past, but nothing has delivered on the frizz busting claims like this formula has. 

The large aerosol can has a push down top that produces a wide, super fine mist. It goes on so light and I think that, in combo with the excellent formula make this so effective.
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing hold + no frizz and no build up.

faceoff_negative.comments: I've been using Joico Joifix Firm Finishing Spray in the pump version for 25 years, I know this for a fact as my hairstylist used it on me when she practiced my hairstyle for my wedding, telling me it would hold my hairstyle through even humidity, which it did (it rained on our wedding day).  I had it on auto order and then all of a sudden my orders stopped, much to my surprise.  Upon investigating I learned the formula had changed to an aerosol, which I despise!  With no other option available I decided to try the new version.  In a nutshell, it stinks!  I can't believe my favorite hairspray has been changed!  I will need to find something comparable now, a duplicate in another brand.  I think most of you reading this review are in the same boat.  Hopefully, I can find something as awesome as the old version was!  Joico, bring back the pump version!!!
faceoff_negative.headline: New formula is aweful
